data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Jalandhar do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jalandhar, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Jalandhar, Punjab, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Jalandhar, Punjab, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the 24,130 believers in Jalandhar to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jat Gandhi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jat Gandhi people.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Jalandhar, Punjab, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,193,600 souls living in the county of Jalandhar with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.section_summary:
the county of Jalandhar, Punjab, India has a population of 2,193,600.

We estimate Jalandhar has 24,130 people who might know Jesus, 26,616 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,142,855 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Jalandhar, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
